bug.short_desc: unable to connect to any of the Internet streams I normally used after upgrading to Firefox 4.0

assigned_to.name: Nobody; OK to take it and work on it

long_desc.thetext:
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.0; en-US; rv:1.9.1.18) Gecko/20110319 Firefox/3.5.18 (.NET CLR 3.5.30729) Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.0; en-US; rv:1.9.1.18) Gecko/20110319 Firefox/3.5.18 (.NET CLR 3.5.30729)
There were absolutely no other problems but I was unwilling to search for other solutions in order to keep using 4.0 and I most definitely will NEVER use IE, I hate it as I do most of Microsoft's products. I uninstalled and am now running 3.5.18 with no problems at all.
Reproducible: Always
Steps to Reproduce: 1.connect to site, 2.select music station..........I tried several, easy listening, nostalgia and a couple others 3.attempt to connect with the stream Actual Results: Go to the site select a music category attempt to connect to the stream player
Expected Results: absolutely nothing
with the prior versions of Firefox a pop-up stream player would load, buffer for a few seconds and then begin to play. In order to use this site and some others which also did not work, I had to uninstall 4.0 and reinstall an earlier version.
I AM NOT anxious about this problem, I am perfectly happy with the prior version of Firefox. Just thought you should know.
